posts.post_title: FS: Two T206 Sovereign - Burke & Mcquillan - PRICE LOWERED
posts.post_content:
I have the two following T206 Sovereign for sale:

I'm asking 60$ delivered for both. Paypal gift/payment owed is fine. Definitely willing to hear offers, send them to [url]npa589@yahoo.com[/url]. That's the best way to contact me. I respond quickly and throughout the day. It's more difficult to respond through Net54 when I'm up and about.


T206 Jimmy Burke Sovereign 350 - PSA 2 (This is undergraded as a 2, this definitely should be a 3)

T206 George Mcquillan Sovereign 150 - PSA 2.5
last price bump! Thanks for the interest.
